column4: hi all. i have a 2005 desktop. no boot from usb and the cd drive is missing. how can i install ubuntu?
is there any way to do it with VM
I had a floppy image that would aloow a boot from usb, looking to see if i can find it
The tool i have is called "Plop Boot Manager"
the bios i have does not have the option "boot from usb"
You boot it from the floppy, then use it to boot the usb
you boot the floppy, then you are presented with mediums to boot from, including usb even on computers without integrated usb boot support
i dont have a floppy cd drive and the bios dont have option to boot from usb
cd drive is missing. floppy disk is missing, and no boot from usb.
oh, you don't have something like a 3.5 inch diskette drive, if not my mistake
